name: Avalonia
description: A mystical land in the 'Odyssey' VR universe, filled with ancient magic, diverse biomes, and mysterious adventures.

locations.name: Central Avalonia
locations.description: Central Avalonia stands as the bustling nexus of the mystical land of Avalonia, teeming with life and activity. It's a place where the old meets the new, with ancient architecture seamlessly blending with vibrant marketplaces. The Grand Castle, visible from miles away, dominates the skyline, symbolizing strength and wisdom. The crossroads of various paths lead to different biomes: the mystical Ethereal Plains to the east, the towering Frostwing Mountains to the north, the mysterious Whispering Forest to the west, and the mysterious Sunken Shores to the south. Central Avalonia serves as a hub for adventurers and travelers, offering a diverse range of experiences from shopping at the Mystic Market to seeking wisdom at the Hall of Elders.

sublocations.name: Grand Castle
sublocations.description: Dominating the skyline of Central Avalonia, the Grand Castle is a beacon of power and history. Its towering spires and fortified walls are a testament to the ancient magic and architecture of Avalonia. The castle is a labyrinth of grand halls and secret passages, each echoing with tales of yore.

items.name: Ancient Artifact
items.description: A mysterious relic from a bygone era, found in the castle's deepest hall.

items.name: Royal Banner
items.description: A banner representing the heritage of Avalonia, adorning the castle walls.

npcs.name: Monk Jaron
npcs.description: Monk Jaron is a serene and contemplative figure, often seen in the quieter parts of the Grand Castle. Cloaked in simple, unadorned robes, he carries an air of tranquility and wisdom. His eyes, gentle yet perceptive, seem to reflect a deep understanding of the mystical and the historical. He is a guardian of ancient knowledge, often found meditating or studying the arcane texts within the castle's walls.
dialog: Welcome, traveler, to the Grand Castle. May clarity guide your path.
The ancients left many secrets within these walls.
Seek wisdom, but beware the shadows that lurk in forgotten corners.

interactions.description: Retrieve the Lost Tome from the Royal Library.

inventory.name: Potion of Clarity
inventory.description: A potion brewed by Monk Jaron that clears the mind and sharpens focus.

rooms.name: Throne Room
rooms.description: The heart of the Grand Castle, the Throne Room is a grandiose hall adorned with ornate tapestries and gleaming armor. The throne itself, a masterpiece of craftsmanship, sits majestically at the far end, a symbol of the kingdom's enduring legacy.

items.name: Ceremonial Sword
items.description: A beautifully crafted sword used in royal ceremonies, displayed prominently in the room.

items.name: Historic Tapestry
items.description: An elaborate tapestry depicting the history of Avalonia, hanging on the walls of the Throne Room.

npcs.name: King Aldor
npcs.description: King Aldor is a dignified and commanding figure, exuding the authority and responsibility of a ruler. His regal attire and kingly demeanor reflect his dedication to the welfare of Avalonia. He is a wise and just monarch, deeply respected by his subjects.
dialog: As ruler of Avalonia, I welcome you to our grand kingdom.
Our land is ancient, and its secrets are many.
Maintaining peace in Avalonia is my solemn duty.

interactions.description: Defend the realm from the encroaching darkness.

inventory.name: Decree of the Realm
inventory.description: An official decree issued by King Aldor, bearing the seal of the kingdom.

npcs.name: Elder Orin
npcs.description: Elder Orin is an aged sage, his face lined with wisdom gained over a lifetime of study. His eyes sparkle with intelligence, and his voice carries the weight of knowledge. Known for his deep understanding of history and magic, he is a revered figure in the castle.
dialog: Knowledge and wisdom are the true foundations of power.
In these ancient scrolls lie the secrets of the past.

inventory.name: Ancient Scroll of Wisdom
inventory.description: A scroll containing ancient wisdom, preserved by Elder Orin.

npcs.name: Queen Mirabelle
npcs.description: Queen Mirabelle is the epitome of grace and benevolence. Her presence is both comforting and inspiring, and she carries an air of serene confidence. Her love for her people and the kingdom is evident in her every action, making her a beloved figure in Avalonia.
dialog: Avalonia thrives under our care and flourishes in peace.
My heart holds deep love for our people and our land.

inventory.name: Amulet of the Ages
inventory.description: A mystical amulet worn by Queen Mirabelle, radiant with ancient energy.

rooms.name: Royal Library
rooms.description: A sanctum of knowledge, the Royal Library houses towering shelves filled with ancient scrolls and books. Soft candlelight flickers across the room, illuminating the wisdom preserved for generations. It's a place of study and discovery, where the past speaks to those who listen.

items.name: Ancient Tome
items.description: A rare and valuable book containing the histories of Avalonia.

items.name: Celestial Globe
items.description: An ornate globe depicting the constellations and celestial bodies, used for astronomical studies.

npcs.name: Lady Elara
npcs.description: Lady Elara is a scholar of ancient history and arcane mysteries. She is often found deep in thought, surrounded by piles of dusty tomes and scrolls.
dialog: In these halls of knowledge, the wisdom of ages is at your fingertips.
Seek and you shall find; the library holds many secrets.

inventory.name: Manuscript of Lost Spells
inventory.description: A manuscript containing forgotten spells and arcane knowledge.

npcs.name: Sir Lorian
npcs.description: Sir Lorian, a knight with a keen interest in historical cartography, often explores the library for ancient maps and legends.
dialog: Maps and scrolls tell of places far beyond these castle walls.
A true knight seeks not only strength but wisdom.

inventory.name: Map to Hidden Treasures
inventory.description: A detailed map leading to hidden treasures across Avalonia.

npcs.name: Scribe Lyra
npcs.description: Scribe Lyra is dedicated to preserving the kingdom's history, always seen with her enchanted quill in hand, transcribing important events and knowledge.
dialog: Every quill stroke is a step towards immortality.
The written word is a powerful tool in discerning hands.

inventory.name: Enchanted Quill
inventory.description: A magical quill that never runs out of ink, used for transcribing important texts.

rooms.name: Secret Chamber
rooms.description: Concealed behind a hidden door in the Royal Library, the Secret Chamber holds the most confidential archives and artifacts of the kingdom. The chamber, shrouded in mystery, is said to contain powerful relics and forbidden knowledge.

items.name: Enchanted Grimoire
items.description: An ancient book of spells bound in shadows, said to hold unimaginable magical powers.

items.name: Orb of Prophecy
items.description: A mysterious crystal orb, pulsating with an inner light, rumored to reveal visions of the future.

items.name: Mystical Tapestry
items.description: A tapestry depicting ancient magical symbols and constellations, adding to the mystical aura of the chamber.

items.name: Alchemist's Set
items.description: An array of alchemical tools and vials, hinting at the experimental nature of the room's previous occupants.

containers.name: Ancient Vault
containers.description: An old, dust-covered vault, rumored to hold items of significant power and mystery.

contains.name: Rune of Shadows
contains.description: A dark rune that holds the essence of shadow magic.

contains.name: Timekeeper's Hourglass
contains.description: An hourglass said to measure more than mere time, potentially connected to ancient time magic.

sublocations.name: Mystic Market
sublocations.description: A vibrant market selling magical artifacts and exotic goods.

shops.name: The Armorer's Forge
shops.description: Crafts and sells weapons and armor.

sublocations.name: Hall of Elders
sublocations.description: A place of wisdom where ancient knowledge is preserved.

rooms.name: Council Chamber
rooms.description: Where the Elders meet to discuss important matters.

rooms.name: Archive of Ages
rooms.description: An archive holding the records of Avalonia's history.

rooms.name: Meditation Hall
rooms.description: A tranquil space for reflection and meditation.
